item.description:
Join P-Collective member Valerie for the Grand Re-Opening of Douglas Fine Wine & Spirits!!!

They are celebrating a beautiful new store with expanded selections in all departments!

Throughout the day there will be tastings of craft beer, fine wine and liquor as well as fabulous appetizers and raffles!

Raffles will include a grill, a bike, coolers and more!

So whether you've been there in the past or never been, this is a great reason to check it out now!

Â I will be wearing a button that says Valerie~drop by anytime during the day!!
item.how_to_find_us: Valerie is hosting this one, please look at her picture!!!
item.name: Douglas Fine Wine & Spirits Grand Re-Opening!
